WRITING.TITLE: I secretly fantasize about hurting people
WRITING.TEXT: Whenever I have an argument or someone has wronged me I usually imagine myself getting revenge on the person often in horrific ways. Example I was fired a few months ago and the boss was so unforgiving about it he is an ass and sometimes I imagine myself returning to work there and taking him out. the same with my dad I dont like him that mush and I imagine making him pay. Just thought I would put that to writing.

WRITING.TITLE: Sometimes I steal loose change from my dad
WRITING.TEXT: I dot have a job ATM so whenever I somehow scrape together some cash and I am a little short I go into my dads room and grab a few quarters. Over the past year it must have equaled 20 dollars. I kinda feel bad but not really cuz he is an asshole.

WRITING.TITLE: It was an accident!!!!!! You stupid idiot!!!!!!
